attributes.additional_details: Hedgerows are leading Hedgehogs to roads , as hedgerows are put up to stop or prevent larger animals going in to roads but in wet weather Slugs & Snails are found in large numbers in over grown areas by roads. The Hedgehogs main food source and then they go into roads.
attributes.background: Change the Laws to keep Hedgehogs safe,  create Hedgehog safe zones like large fields with fences and hedgerows in or walls to stop Hedgehogs going onto roads as roads and Road kill is the main reason for hedgehog decline and why they are on the red list

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action: 

Add hedgehogs to schedule 5 of the Wildlife & Countryside Act 1981
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709054

Introduce legal standards for hedgehog houses
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716755

Make hedgehog highways mandatory on all new fencing.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701939
